alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 4:12PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Lackawanna, southwestern Wayne and northeastern Luzerne Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 411 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Glendale, or over Pittston, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scranton, Wilkes-Barre, Dunmore, Kingston, Plains, Old Forge, Pittston, Taylor, Moosic and Exeter. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 170A and B and 185. Interstate 84 near 4. Interstate 380 between 20 and 24. Interstate 476 between 115 and 122. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
